website_summaries.verdict: An easy to use and store plastic drying rack that is lightweight, although some found it to be on the flimsy side.
pros: Comes in your choice of yellow, green, or white
Takes up little room, and collapses for easy storage
cons: Some buyers felt the quality of this option was poor, and that the rack is overall too flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Buy This If You Make Your Own Pasta!
customer_reviews.text: Since taking a cooking class in Italy, we don't buy pasta anymore - we make it from scratch. One problem had always been that the pasta would tend to "clump up" when it was sitting before we put into the water. This drying rack was the perfect solution. It takes very little room on the countertop but provides a convenient place to put the pasta. Plus, it's incredibly easy to slide it off the arms and into the boiling water. A definite "must buy" if you make your own pasta!
customer_reviews.author: RonR

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: This was better and less expensive than the cake brand drying racks I saw! I used it for drying componants used for my surger flowers. I hung 35 leaves with room to spare! And I love how it breaks down easily as one piece and stores copmact and small. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We make a lot of pasta and this is a great drying rack. Just don't make the pasta to early or it dries to much and breaks when taken off the rack
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kerns

customer_reviews.title: I love this rack
customer_reviews.text: I started making homemade pasta again after going to Italy and taking a cooking class. I love this rack. I use to have noodles all over the counter top drying in the past. This rack is easy to use and collapses for easy storage. My kitchen is small and I wanted a collapsible rack that took up limited space. This one is perfect and holds a large amount of noodles. I bought one for my daughter too!
customer_reviews.author: Tim R.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2nd use....it’s complete junk!!!! Don’t buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy!!! Broke after second use!!!!! I really wanted to like this but it is made of complete garbage plastic and snapped upon putting fresh pasta on it. There are much better options out there and I guess I got what I paid for. ...Junk. Save your money and look elsewhere!!!!
customer_reviews.author: FlyfishVT

customer_reviews.title: Works, but a bit wobbly/wacky
customer_reviews.text: There's a knack to setting it up. Once you do it (right), it's pretty sturdy when locked in place. One tip: Don't load the pasta all on one side or it tips--think about balance when you're putting your pasta on it. Overall I like the idea. It's super handy that you can just set it up and then fold it down so small when not in use. For a cheap plastic rack, it's actually a pretty nifty idea.
customer_reviews.author: At Home in My Head

customer_reviews.title: I like this just not for pasta
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this. It was a bit of a pain to open and close and that my pasta dried it broke in half and fell. I am however keeping the item as it can come in handy for my garden or my crafting
customer_reviews.author: Cgd93

customer_reviews.title: Great pasta dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I described holds a lot of positive dry looks decorative I use it every day will recommend to my friends
customer_reviews.author: manuel sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Like that it collapses
customer_reviews.text: This item is simple to figure out to get it to stand. It kind of snaps into place. No directions. What I love the most is that it doesn’t take up cabinet space. It is not an item I will use daily, so this is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Terry W-C

customer_reviews.title: Great design pasta drying rack
customer_reviews.text: Used it to hang my cheesecloth or air drying homemade pasta. Love how it is made of plastic. Easy to clean. Collapsible. Easy to store. Good design.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Great product for drying homemade pasta
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to use drying rack for your homemade pastas. Easy to store and clean. Recommend this product for the home cook who loves homemade fresh pasta!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, does what it says it does, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, does what it says it does, easy to clean. It’s not super stable because of how light it is, but that hasn’t been a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: TJF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Makes making pasta so much easier than laying on the table to dry. Easy to set up and stores away super small and easy! Need to use caution when taking the pasta off to avoid breaking the noodles!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B. Rose

customer_reviews.title: I like that it folds up for staying in a drawer
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped that the feet would have better contact with a table top or counter.
customer_reviews.author: Jlr

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: I make my own pasta and found this a great help.
customer_reviews.author: Dar J

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This product was not only not easy to use but was not sturdy. Would not stand up. Feet would not stay on and would not sit flat on table.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Pulitano

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like??
customer_reviews.text: Enough room on this for about a pound of noodles or spaghetti-type pasta. Folds down quickly for storage.
customer_reviews.author: pattyb

customer_reviews.title: Snapped pieces
customer_reviews.text: Some of the pieces were snapped off while taking it out of the box and setting it up. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Tol

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This rack holds a lot of pasta in a small space and folds up neatly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fratto

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and collapses for storage. Strong and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great pasta rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pasta rack. Folds up for storage!
customer_reviews.author: pamelanovak

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because it wish it were a little taller.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: A little bit short!
customer_reviews.text: The rack is a little bit short and small. But it do has good quality and it’s easy do use and to keep it small for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia A P

customer_reviews.title: perfect device
customer_reviews.text: perfect for drying noodles... Liked it so much, I bought it again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rory J. Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: It definitely gets the job done. I started making pasta at home recently and this really helps keep me from getting noodles/pasta everywhere. Easy to clean and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, good craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. Appreciate that they are made of seemingly sturdy plastic with nonskid foot cups. Good spacing between each spindle, easily collapses for easy storage
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Great Gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price, was as expected and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: alleyoop4

customer_reviews.title: Great noodle stand
customer_reviews.text: Great product and so happy to use it! Highly recommend for home made pasta making.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! No more coat hangers of pasta hanging all of my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: ian foster

customer_reviews.title: I use it every week to make pasta for the family!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and take down...a child could do it! Easily holds enough pasta for a family of 6. Been using it weekly for almost a year and wonder how I did without it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bettencourt

customer_reviews.title: Pasta Drying Rack
customer_reviews.text: the pasta drying rack came in damaged and it was returned
customer_reviews.author: Julie Machuga

customer_reviews.title: Easy rack for noodles
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to set up and take down for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas N. Spackman

customer_reviews.title: Works great for fresh pasta noodles!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very simple to use. Some reviewers complained about their noodles stretching and breaking, or drying too fast and falling apart, but that isn’t the fault of this drying rack; that’s a dough-consistency issue. If you make really long noodles you may want to put this rack on top of something tall so the noodles have room to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Miseta

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars if the instructions had not been in Chinese, but turned out fairly simple to figure out. The grandkids and I made pasta and they enjoyed hanging it on the rack, it worked just as I had hoped. The pasta was dry and ready to cook in a couple of hours. The kids were able to easily fold it and put it back in the box for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca L-J

customer_reviews.title: Being new to the world of noodle making... we were in need of a dryer..
customer_reviews.text: This did the trick, although I wish the leg was longer. I couldn’t have known how tall I would have wanted though, having never done this before. In the meantime I prop it up on our table and it gives me the length I want. It folds up small with ease, pops right back into the box, and is easy to store when we aren’t noodle making. We won’t be needing to upgrade in the near future, this should continue to do the job for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Kilted Gamer and Wife

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Used this a couple of times. Its fairly easy to assemble but seems like it will fall apart. It is not very sturdy; mot sure how much pasta it will really hold without tipping over of falling apart. I just now add my fresh pasta right to the boiling pot. For the price, it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good thing to have for pasta
customer_reviews.text: A good thing to have for pasta. Two problems; one, my pasta that was a little too wet suck to bars and stretched a little. Second, it limits how long of pasta you can make. Those problems would be the same with any drying rack. Overall, I love it! Sturdy while holding pasta and it folds up small. I love mine and wished I had bought one earlier.
customer_reviews.author: D. Glanville

customer_reviews.title: HANDY LITTLE DEVICE
customer_reviews.text: Nice noodle-drying rack. It's easy to fold out and holds a good quantity of noodles. It's also well-balanced and not tipsy if over-loaded on one side. Folding it up, into a convenient storage size, is also easily done. Inexpensive and will hopefully prove durable.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Runyon

customer_reviews.title: Folding action is a little stiff
customer_reviews.text: It holds pasta for two just fine; I wouldn't want to try to crowd more on. I was very glad the instructions for refolding it were on the box, because I didn't find the way obvious. But when you look at them, it's easy.
customer_reviews.author: Plubo Jort

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: The product came on time and was packaged well. The rack is easy to use and wash. I can even collapse it to store easily. Great product. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: This was a little tippy And not a restaurant grade dryer but for someone making spaghetti and looking for a cheap way to hang it this thing works great
customer_reviews.author: Scott B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love It(See My Picture)!
customer_reviews.text: If my Hin Plus Pasta Drying Rack had been bigger, i would have made more pasta lol. Excellent price and high recommendation from me #FoundItOnAmazon
customer_reviews.author: Truer Reviewer 2019

customer_reviews.title: Functional and compact
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rack for my wife who was ready to try making pasta her first time. The rack folds up to a very nice compact size. The unit is easy to set up and holds a lot of pasta. Overall a great unit.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J Julian III

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of pasta
customer_reviews.text: For the money it's assembles in 2 minutes and holds a lot of pasta. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffexit7

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little wobbly but serves it’s purpose and easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: TAC

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this !!She makes the noodles
customer_reviews.text: She makes noodles more often now, and I get to reap the benefits. Fair trade !!!
customer_reviews.author: ironcitymadman

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. And to put away. Works great for the pasta. No the product is not flimsy at all.
customer_reviews.author: AzulLilly

customer_reviews.title: Big enough and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: This holds at lease two batches of homemade pasta. It cleans up easy and easy to store. Really glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett C

customer_reviews.title: Inexspensive
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you are going to make a lot of pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my pasta drying rack, it holds a lot of pasta and can fold up and stored easily!
customer_reviews.author: m germ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this drying rack. Good quality. Folds very compact for storage
customer_reviews.author: JessiB

product_meta.title: Hin Plus Pasta Drying Rack Collapsible (Yellow)
product_meta.description: Color:YellowDon't like it after receive,simply send it back and get your refund
feature_bullets: SAFE & STURDY: Made of Restaurant Quality , BPA-free, Environmental ABS plastic.
FOLDABLE and SPACE SAVING - Tmaking it convenient to store in any kitchen drawer.
EASY to USE:Just turn the black wheel at the top clockwise and the arms spread out evenly, Convenient-anti-skidding design.
Ideal for drying a variety of pasta including spaghetti, tagliatelle, fettuccine, vermicelli, linguine & lasagne
Size: 28cm(11 inches) height; 16.8cm(6.6 inches) length for each Arm.
